resources.string: Mute phone - This allows you to set start time of mute and end time of mute, repeat on what days, label of alarm and vibration on or off
Quick Mute - This allows you to set alarm quick, suchh as alarm for short meeting eg 30mins and also you can pick if you want vibration on!
Turn off Alarm - To turn off alarm click on the alarm you want to turn off and it bring you to the edit alarm and there is a button at the bottom to turn it off
Delete Alarm - Long press on the alarm you want to delete and a pop will ask if you want to delete alarm
Edit Alarm - To edit alarm just click on the alarm you want to edit.
